TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CommandEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Command`单击或控件时，将引发事件 。The `Command` event is raised when a or control is clicked. 对象包含有关事件的数据 `Command` ，该事件可在事件处理程序中进行访问。The object contains data about the `Command` event that can be accessed in the event handler. 使用类中可用的属性 ，可以确定要执行的命令的名称（例如），以及 `Sort` 补充命令的可选参数（如） `Ascending` 。Using the properties available in the class, you can determine the name of the command to perform, such as `Sort`, in addition to an optional argument that supplements the command, such as `Ascending`. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表 ，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问中的属性 ，以确定要执行的命令。The following example demonstrates how to access the properties in to determine the command to perform. 此示例使用控件的属性以声明方式指定事件处理程序 。This example specifies the event handler declaratively, using the property of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何指定事件处理程序，并以编程方式将其添加到方法中的事件 `Page_Load` 。The following code example demonstrates how to specify the event handler and programmatically add it to the event in the `Page_Load` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommand/CS/buttoncommandcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommand/VB/buttoncommandvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化 使用指定对象的类的新实例 。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class using the specified object. 当 通过调用此构造函数创建的实例时，以下属性将初始化为指定值。When an instance of is created by a call to this constructor, the following properties are initialized to the specified values. |属性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |CommandNameCommandName|`e.CommandName` 参数。The `e.CommandName` parameter.| |CommandArgumentCommandArgument|`e.CommandArgument` 参数。The `e.CommandArgument` parameter.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 使用指定的对象创建和初始化类的新实例 。The following example demonstrates how to create and initialize a new instance of the class using the specified object. span.span: Gets the argument for the command.
A that contains the argument for the command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以包含由程序员设置的任何字符串。The can contain any string set by the programmer. 属性 通过允许提供命令的任何附加信息来补充属性。The property complements the property by allowing you to provide any additional information for the command. 例如，可以将 属性设置为， `Sort` 并将属性设置 为， `Ascending` 以指定要按升序排序的命令。For example, you can set the property to `Sort` and set the property to `Ascending` to specify a command to sort in ascending order. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来确定要执行的命令的补充信息。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine supplemental information for the command to perform. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets the name of the command.
The name of the command to perform.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定要执行的命令。Use the property to determine the command to perform. 属性可以包含由程序员设置的任何字符串。The property can contain any string set by the programmer. 然后，程序员可以在代码中标识命令名称并执行相应的任务。The programmer can then identify the command name in code and perform the appropriate tasks. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以 编程方式确定要执行的命令。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically determine the command to perform. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)]
